    • Constructor Detail

      • RunGame

        public RunGame(java.util.ArrayList<Player> players,
               CardInit gameCards,
               Spinner spinner,
               java.util.ArrayList<Space> spaceList,
               BoardInit gameBoard)
        RunGame constructor, while gameRound returns true, it will continually run.
        Parameters:
        players - List of Player objects playing the game
        gameCards - CardInit object, initialisation if all card objects used in the game
        spinner - Spinner, for determining Spinner values.
        spaceList - List of Space Objects, sorted by Space Number
        gameBoard - BoardInit containing game board visualisation

    • Method Detail

      • gameRound

        public boolean gameRound(java.util.ArrayList<Player> players,
                         CardInit gameCards,
                         Spinner spinner,
                         java.util.ArrayList<Space> spaceList,
                         BoardInit gameBoard)
        gameRound() method continually runs while the game is not finished, when all players have retired the method will return false, and the method will finish. Calls playerTurn() every loop, so controls the order players take their turns
        Parameters:
        players - List of Player object playing the game
        gameCards - CardInit object, initialisation if all card objects used in the game
        spinner - Spinner, for determining Spinner values.
        spaceList - List of Space Objects, sorted by Space Number
        gameBoard - BoardInit containing game board visualisation
        Returns:
        Returns Boolean false when all players have retired

      • playerTurn

        public void playerTurn(java.util.ArrayList<Player> players,
                       int currPlayerIndex,
                       CardInit gameCards,
                       Spinner spinner,
                       java.util.ArrayList<Space> spaceList,
                       BoardInit gameBoard)
        playerTurn() is the turn manager for a general turn of a player. Prints players details. If player is retired, end turn. Otherwise, calls a spinMove(). Redraws gameBoard reflecting updated player position. Calls executeCurrentSpace() to perform action based on the current space the player is on.
        Parameters:
        players - List of Player objects playing the game
        currPlayerIndex - Index of the current Player in players whose turn it is.
        gameCards - CardInit object, initialisation if all card objects used in the game
        spinner - Spinner, for determining Spinner values.
        spaceList - List of Space Objects, sorted by Space Number
        gameBoard - BoardInit containing game board visualisation
